original_text:
Kronos Unleashed
Ogni anno escono film su film al cinema con il tema principale delle divinità greche. Si tratta di ambientazioni elettrizzanti, come il monte Olimpo e molto altro. Le storie che legano i vari dèi sono sempre estremamente affascinanti e da oggi puoi godertele anche nelle Slot Machine.
Sappiamo bene tutti che quando bisogna scegliere la Slot Machine a cui affidarsi per le proprie scommesse, vale la regola che “anche l’occhio vuole la sua parte”.
Se la tua passione è la mitologia greca, con le divinità e i templi a loro dedicati, Kronos Unleashed può decisamente fare al caso tuo. Continua a leggere per scoprire tutto ciò che devi sapere su questa slot!
Una grafica mitologica
Ti abbiamo detto che i protagonisti della Slot Machine sono le divinità, ma in realtà non è così. Il personaggio principale di Kronos Unleashed, la slot prodotta da WMS, come avrai capito dal nome, è Crono. Era il re dei Titani, quindi avrai capito che l’ambientazione geografica è il Monte Otri dove, secondo la mitologia, si sarebbe svolta la guerra tra i Titani e gli Dèi dell’Olimpo.
Mentre ottieni tutti i bonus, sopra i rulli potrai notare Crono, con le sue braccia muscolose incrociate, che ti osserva. Dovrai fare il tuo meglio per dare una buona impressione al re dei Titani.
Se vuoi scommettere i tuoi soldi guardando sullo sfondo una città greca in fiamme, scegliere Kronos Unleashed potrebbe essere una buona idea. Prima di andare oltre, però, devi conoscere la struttura tecnica e le funzioni speciali di questa Slot Machine.
Le funzioni e la Lightning Respins
Ti diciamo subito che la struttura è abbastanza nella media. Si parla di 60 linee di pagamento per 5 rulli. La cosa interessante, però, è che con sei simboli di Crono dello stesso colore, potrai godere della funzione Lightning Respins, che porta ad una espansione della matrice per un massimo di 100 linee di pagamento. Avrai molte più probabilità di vincere e te ne accorgerai subito con tutti i soldi che guadagnerai.
I simboli speciali che puoi trovare sono il leone, il trono, i templi, il pegaso alato e, come già detto, le immagini di Crono dei vari colori. Se ti stai chiedendo quale sia il simbolo Wild, la risposta è il tempio. Come un qualsiasi Wild che si rispetti, potrà sostituire il valore di un qualsiasi simbolo, tranne il leone e Crono.
Per quanto riguarda il re dei Titani, oltre a procedere alla funzione Lightning nel caso di una sequenza di sei immagini uguali, rappresenta anche il simbolo Scatter. Se appare tre volte contemporaneamente, potrai effettuare tre giri gratis, che significano tante probabilità di guadagnare soldi senza utilizzare il tuo credito di gioco.
Altre Slot se ti è piaciuta questa
Se la tua passione è la mitologia greca, allora devi assolutamente conoscere un’altra Slot Machine prodotta da WMS. Si tratta di Zeus ed è una delle più famose slot di Las Vegas. Si tratta di un classico e stavolta, invece di giocare per conto di Crono, vincerai per arricchire Zeus, suo figlio e acerrimo nemico.

raw_translation.response:
Kronos Unleashed is a slot game that will take you on a journey to the world of Greek gods and mythology. The electrifying setting of Mount Olympus and the stories of the various deities will fascinate experienced gamblers. We know that when it comes to choosing a slot game to bet on, the eye also wants its share.

If you have a passion for Greek mythology, with the gods and the temples dedicated to them, then Kronos Unleashed is the slot game for you. The main character of this slot game, produced by WMS, is Cronus - the king of the Titans. The geographical setting is Mount Othrys, where the war between the Titans and the Olympian gods took place.

As you spin the reels and obtain all the bonuses, Cronus, with his muscular arms crossed, will be watching over you. You must impress the king of the Titans if you want to win big. The background of a burning Greek city creates an intense atmosphere for your betting experience.

With 60 paylines and 5 reels, Kronos Unleashed has a standard structure. However, if you manage to obtain six Cronus symbols of the same color, you will trigger the Lightning Respins feature. This will expand the matrix and give you a maximum of 100 paylines, increasing your chances of winning big.

The special symbols in this slot game include the lion, the throne, the temples, the winged Pegasus, and the Cronos symbols of different colors. The temple is the Wild symbol, which can replace any other symbol except for the lion and Cronus.

Cronus also represents the Scatter symbol and, if three Scatters appear at the same time, you will receive three free spins, which means more chances to earn money without using your game credit.

If you enjoyed this slot game and Greek mythology in general, then you must try another WMS production called Zeus. It is one of the most famous slots in Las Vegas and with this classic game, you will have the opportunity to win big for Zeus, Cronus' son and archenemy.

raw_translation.response:
Kronos Unleashed
Every year, there are more films at cinemas with the main theme centered around Greek gods. These electrifying scenes, such as Mount Olympus, always provide fascinating stories that connect various deities, and now, you can enjoy them in a Slot Machine.

As seasoned gamblers, we know that not only do we need to choose a trustworthy Slot Machine for our wagers, but the visual appeal also plays a significant role.

Should you have a passion for Greek mythology, including their respective temples and divinities, then Kronos Unleashed should be right up your alley. Keep reading to gain insight into everything you need to know about this Slot!

Mythical Graphics
Although we stated that the gods are the protagonists of the Slot Machine, that is not necessarily true. The main character of Kronos Unleashed, produced by WMS, is Cronus, the Titan king. Given the name, you may have guessed that this Slot operates within the geographical setting of Mount Othrys, where, according to mythology, the Titans went to war against the Olympian gods.

While achieving all your bonuses, you will undoubtedly notice Cronus, muscular arms crossed, looking at you from above the reels. You must do your best to make a good impression on the king of the Titans.

If you want to bet while observing a burning Greek city in the background, then choosing Kronos Unleashed could be an excellent idea. However, before proceeding, it would be best to know the technical structure and special functions of this Slot Machine.

Functions and Lightning Respins
This particular Slot has a relatively average structure with 60 pay lines on 5 reels. However, if you manage to collect six Cronus symbols of the same color, you can enjoy the Lightning Respins feature, which expands the matrix to a maximum of 100 pay lines. With increased odds of winning, you will undoubtedly begin to notice your growing wealth.

Special symbols in this game include the lion, throne, temples, winged Pegasus, and Cronus of different colors. If you are wondering which symbol represents the Wild, it is the temple. Like any respectable Wild, it can replace the value of any symbol, except for the lion and Cronus.

Regarding the Titan king, in addition to triggering the Lightning function in case of a sequence of six identical images, he also represents the Scatter symbol. Should he appear three times simultaneously, you can spin the reels thrice for free, representing a chance to earn money without using your gaming credit.

Alternatives to This Slot
If Greek mythology is your passion, then you simply must know about another Slot Machine produced by WMS, Zeus. It is one of the most popular slots in Las Vegas. It is a classic, and this time, instead of playing on behalf of Cronus, you will play to enrich Zeus, his son and eternal foe.

Kronos Unleashed
Every year, there are more films at cinemas with the main theme centered around Greek gods. These electrifying scenes, such as Mount Olympus, always provide fascinating stories that connect various deities, and now, you can enjoy them in a Slot Machine.

As seasoned gamblers, we know that not only do we need to choose a trustworthy Slot Machine for our wagers, but the visual appeal also plays a significant role.

Review: Kronos Unleashed
Every year, there are more films at cinemas with the main theme centered around Greek gods. These electrifying scenes, such as Mount Olympus, always provide fascinating stories that connect various deities, and now, you can enjoy them in a Slot Machine.

As seasoned gamblers, we know that not only do we need to choose a trustworthy Slot Machine for our wagers, but the visual appeal also plays a significant role.

Should you have a passion for Greek mythology, including their respective temples and divinities, then Kronos Unleashed should be right up your alley. Keep reading to gain insight into everything you need to know about this Slot!

Mythical Graphics
Although we stated that the gods are the protagonists of the Slot Machine, that is not necessarily true. The main character of Kronos Unleashed, produced by WMS, is Cronus, the Titan king. Given the name, you may have guessed that this Slot operates within the geographical setting of Mount Othrys, where, according to mythology, the Titans went to war against the Olympian gods.

While achieving all your bonuses, you will undoubtedly notice Cronus, muscular arms crossed, looking at you from above the reels. You must do your best to make a good impression on the king of the Titans.

If you want to bet while observing a burning Greek city in the background, then choosing Kronos Unleashed could be an excellent idea. However, before proceeding, it would be best to know the technical structure and special functions of this Slot Machine.

Functions and Lightning Respins
This particular Slot has a relatively average structure with 60 pay lines on 5 reels. However, if you manage to collect six Cronus symbols of the same color, you can enjoy the Lightning Respins feature, which expands the matrix to a maximum of 100 pay lines. With increased odds of winning, you will undoubtedly begin to notice your growing wealth.

Special symbols in this game include the lion, throne, temples, winged Pegasus, and Cronus of different colors. If you are wondering which symbol represents the Wild, it is the temple. Like any respectable Wild, it can replace the value of any symbol, except for the lion and Cronus.

Regarding the Titan king, in addition to triggering the Lightning function in case of a sequence of six identical images, he also represents the Scatter symbol. Should he appear three times simultaneously, you can spin the reels thrice for free, representing a chance to earn money without using your gaming credit.

Alternatives to This Slot
If Greek mythology is your passion, then you simply must know about another Slot Machine produced by WMS, Zeus. It is one of the most popular slots in Las Vegas. It is a classic, and this time, instead of playing on behalf of Cronus, you will play to enrich Zeus, his son and eternal foe.

Kronos Unleashed, developed by WMS, sticks to the usual gameplay mechanics with 60 pay lines and 5 reels. But who wants to settle for usual when there's Lightning Respins feature to amp up the excitement?

What is the Lightning Respins, you ask? A chance for players to collect six Cronus symbols of the same color and expand the matrix to a whopping 100 pay lines! That's right, folks - hit this feature and you'll not only increase your chances of winning, but you'll also experience some electrifying action.

Review: Kronos Unleashed
Every year, there are more films at cinemas with the main theme centered around Greek gods. These electrifying scenes, such as Mount Olympus, always provide fascinating stories that connect various deities, and now, you can enjoy them in a Slot Machine.

As seasoned gamblers, we know that not only do we need to choose a trustworthy Slot Machine for our wagers, but the visual appeal also plays a significant role.

Should you have a passion for Greek mythology, including their respective temples and divinities, then Kronos Unleashed should be right up your alley. Keep reading to gain insight into everything you need to know about this Slot!

Mythical Graphics
Although we stated that the gods are the protagonists of the Slot Machine, that is not necessarily true. The main character of Kronos Unleashed, produced by WMS, is Cronus, the Titan king. Given the name, you may have guessed that this Slot operates within the geographical setting of Mount Othrys, where, according to mythology, the Titans went to war against the Olympian gods.

While achieving all your bonuses, you will undoubtedly notice Cronus, muscular arms crossed, looking at you from above the reels. You must do your best to make a good impression on the king of the Titans.

If you want to bet while observing a burning Greek city in the background, then choosing Kronos Unleashed could be an excellent idea. However, before proceeding, it would be best to know the technical structure and special functions of this Slot Machine.

Functions and Lightning Respins
This particular Slot has a relatively average structure with 60 pay lines on 5 reels. However, if you manage to collect six Cronus symbols of the same color, you can enjoy the Lightning Respins feature, which expands the matrix to a maximum of 100 pay lines. With increased odds of winning, you will undoubtedly begin to notice your growing wealth.

Special symbols in this game include the lion, throne, temples, winged Pegasus, and Cronus of different colors. If you are wondering which symbol represents the Wild, it is the temple. Like any respectable Wild, it can replace the value of any symbol, except for the lion and Cronus.

Regarding the Titan king, in addition to triggering the Lightning function in case of a sequence of six identical images, he also represents the Scatter symbol. Should he appear three times simultaneously, you can spin the reels thrice for free, representing a chance to earn money without using your gaming credit.

Alternatives to This Slot
If Greek mythology is your passion, then you simply must know about another Slot Machine produced by WMS, Zeus. It is one of the most popular slots in Las Vegas. It is a classic, and this time, instead of playing on behalf of Cronus, you will play to enrich Zeus, his son and eternal foe.
